song_lyric:
Everyone's gonna miss you
for your heart is on your way
Oh everyone's gonna hate you for a little
'cause you will bring us away
We try to say goodbye to you but
the word get stuck within
you know it, something that we did not say is
It's hard to believe you're flying away
we all love you and try to remember the day we met
It's just a break, we hope you take good care
Everyone's gonna miss you
for your heart is on your way
Oh everyone's gonna hate you for a little
'cause you will bring us away
We try to say goodbye to you but
the word get stuck within
you know it, something that we did not say is
It's hard to believe you're flying away
we all love you and try to remember the day we met
It's just a break, we hope you take good care
